content:
Hello,
Are we planning for a SANER Connectathon in January? I went and announced that the Symptomatic SANER mapping servers would be available for Connectathon26, and invited the HHS At-Home Diagnostic Testing Design-a-Thon community. (Please vote for our submission; deadline is this Friday). They have interest in adding CARES act reporting to the SANER specification.

https://waters.crowdicity.com/post/695516?forPhase=24538
